item.description:
I saw Hunters about a month ago and really liked them. If you like garage punk similar to Be Your Own PET, then Hunters is right up your alley. Hunters hails from Brooklyn, NY.

If you haven't heard their music before check out their website: http://huntershunters.com/ or they're on http://www.huntersny.bandcamp.com. "Hands on Fire"is their latest album.

Show is at 9pm, whch usually means things won't start til 9:30-10pm. Tickets are $15 ADV/ $17 DOS and can be purchased via www.ticketmaster.com.

I will be there around 9:30pm. Great Scott is a small venue, so it will be easy to find me. I'll send out my mobile number closer to the event date for all those attending.
item.name: Hunters with JEFF The Brotherhood
